name: **Duvillaun Beg**
description: Duvillaun Beg F588-164 Sheet 22 The landing point is on a storm beach just NE of south-western tip. Otherwise, land on rocks just N of a long spit at the eastern tip. Pleasant enough place. Sward grazed by sheep in season. Inhabited by a single family called Gamble in the mid-19th century
